headline: McCormick (NYSE:MKC) Declares US$0.45 Quarterly Dividend
summary: McCormick (NYSE:MKC) has seen several important developments recently, including its announcement of a quarterly dividend of $0.45 and the continuation of its share buyback program. Despite these positive steps, the company's stock price fell 3% over the last quarter. This decline aligns with broader market trends as the S&P 500 dropped 12% amid U.S.-China trade tensions and heightened volatility. McCormick's flat earnings per share and slight dip in net income year-over-year may have added...
